Edgewood Sailing School: Telemetry Workshop

Thu Jul 31 2025

We had a great time running a DIY local radio telemetry workshop at the Edgewood Sailing School in Cranston, RI! Here are some pics from the workshop:

Getting set up for the telemetry workshop.
Workshop in progress.
Exploring the telemetry equipment.
Hands-on learning with the radio equipment.
Building telemetry devices.
Testing the equipment.
Working together on the project.
The radio telemetry setup.
Wrapping up a successful workshop!
Click to watch a video demo of the tilt sensor in action!
